name: Scrap Warrior
text:
"Scrap Synchron" + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can add to your hand, or send to the GY, 1 "Junk Synchron" or 1 card that mentions "Junk Warrior" from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Scrap Warrior" once per turn. The activated effects of monsters that mention "Junk Warrior", and Synchro Monsters with "Warrior" in their original names, that you control cannot be negated, except "Scrap Warrior".
